title: Styles P Joins the Show
description:
Styles P talks to joins the show to talk about what it would be like for the Knicks to trade for Donovan Mitchell and also peels back the curtain on what it was like to work with the Notorious B.I.G. Also, tampering charges for the Knicks and 76ers? Why the guys liken it to jaywalking, there should be rules, but is it really enforceable? Plus another trade offer for GM Jalen for Kevin Durant. This time it’s the Memphis Grizzlies and it has Jalen thinking hard about accepting. Find out if he says yes. And Tiger was reportedly offered up to $800 million dollars to join the LIV. Listen to hear if the guys think that’s enough money to say yes.

itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
